comment.author: 66196307@N05
comment._content: That's my Uncle "Lawrence Snuffy Arthur" in that photo. I was told he worked with Jimmy Dorsey for a time, but could not find anything about it. If anyone hears/sees anything about him working with Mr. Dorsey, please let me know. My name is John Francis Arthur Daly.
